title: Easy Device Informer Plus
summary: EDI+ for smart watches. The app gives information about your Android Wear device
description: - Welcome to E.D.I. + -This is an information application for Android Wear.The use of EDI+ is simple. Just scroll the screen up or down and find the info what you need.You can find informations about your device in different categories.    1, QuickView - A quick overview of the most important features of your Wear device.    2, Hardware - Displaying info about the manufacturer, model #, chipset, display, battery...   3, Software - Some info about the Android OS   4, Sensors - Showing the supported sensors in your device   5, Tests & Apps - You can test the vibrating motor, the display and more. Also the the mini apps are here.
descriptionHTML:
- Welcome to E.D.I. + -

This is an information application for Android Wear.

The use of EDI+ is simple. Just scroll the screen up or down and find the info what you need.

You can find informations about your device in different categories.

1, QuickView - A quick overview of the most important features of your Wear device.
2, Hardware - Displaying info about the manufacturer, model #, chipset, display, battery...
3, Software - Some info about the Android OS
4, Sensors - Showing the supported sensors in your device
5, Tests & Apps - You can test the vibrating motor, the display and more. Also the the mini apps are here.
comments: Pretty nice I like the layout. Very easy to use.
